page.title: 12TRADE IN LYTHE AREA
page.content: {TRADE:-} The village has one general store cum post office which is a member of a national food chain and it is served by the following mobile traders:- a daily delivery of milk a twice weekly delivery of bread and cakes a weekly delivery of wet fish. 54% of the villagers buy their food in Whitby,31% from the village store and the rest from Guisborough, Scarborough or Middlesbrough. 36% villagers buy their clothes at Whitby,28%from Scarborough,19% from Middlesbrough and 17% from Mail Order firms.
